title: You Have The Cure | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: You Have The Cure | Joel Osteen
description:
When Jesus went to the cross, He bore our weaknesses and failures. That means you're not at the mercy of what’s coming against you. What the enemy meant for harm, God is going to use to your advantage.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
